value_claims.claim_title: AI platform enables proactive grid problem resolution through automated rerouting
value_claims.claim_description: The Advanced Power Distribution Platform uses AI to forecast equipment overloads and automatically identifies fixes like rerouting power, enabling proactive resolution of grid issues before they affect customers.
value_claims.source_quote: Say the tool forecasts an equipment overload, it automatically identifies a fix – like rerouting power.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The platform directly performs forecasting and automatic identification of solutions without human intervention in the decision loop.

value_claims.claim_title: Hourly forecasting enables distributed energy resource screening for peak demand
value_claims.claim_description: The platform generates hourly forecasts that enable engineers to screen for distributed energy sources to power customers during high electricity demand periods.
value_claims.source_quote: It also generates an hourly forecast, enabling engineers to screen for distributed energy sources to power customers when demand for electricity is high.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: AI generates forecasts that enable engineers to make decisions about distributed energy resource deployment.

value_claims.claim_title: Automated platform predicts and adjusts for consumption levels to match supply with demand
value_claims.claim_description: The platform can predict consumption levels and adjust to ensure power generation supply meets electricity distribution demand, forecasting loads with better accuracy to prevent customer power issues.
value_claims.source_quote: The automated platform can predict and adjust for consumption levels to ensure supply (power generation) meets demand for electricity (distribution).
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The platform autonomously predicts and adjusts consumption levels without requiring human decision-making in the operational loop.

value_claims.claim_title: AI enables grid flexibility for intermittent renewables while maintaining reliability and affordability
value_claims.claim_description: The patented technology gives engineers confidence that as more intermittent renewables are added, the grid can flex up and down to maintain reliability and keep costs affordable for customers.
value_claims.source_quote: engineers can feel more confident that as more intermittent renewables are added, the grid can flex up and down to maintain reliability and keep costs affordable for customers.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The AI platform directly enables the grid flexibility capability that maintains reliability and cost control as renewables are integrated.

value_claims.claim_title: Platform will optimize millions of renewable power storage and dispatch decisions instantly
value_claims.claim_description: The patented technology will help optimize the storage and dispatching of renewable power, potentially requiring millions of decisions in an instant as implementation progresses.
value_claims.source_quote: the platform's patented technology will eventually help optimize the storage and dispatching of renewable power, which could require millions of decisions in an instant.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The platform directly performs millions of optimization decisions at speeds impossible for human operators, representing autonomous decision-making capability.

value_claims.claim_title: AI reduces cost of green energy transition by utilizing existing customer assets
value_claims.claim_description: According to the managing director, the cost of the green revolution will be significantly reduced because the AI platform utilizes assets that already exist at customers' homes.
value_claims.source_quote: In the end, the cost of the green revolution will be way less, because we're utilizing an asset that already exists at people's homes.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The AI platform enables the utilization strategy that directly reduces costs by coordinating existing distributed assets rather than requiring new infrastructure.

value_claims.claim_title: AI and ML technologies accelerate distributed energy resource and EV rollout
value_claims.claim_description: John Pressley's teams leverage AI, ML, deep learning, and IoT technologies to accelerate the rollout of distributed energy resources and electric vehicles in support of Duke Energy's 2050 zero carbon goal.
value_claims.source_quote: his teams leverage technologies such as AI, ML, deep learning, and IoT to push the company in new, innovative directions.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: AI and ML are among multiple technologies used together to accelerate rollout, suggesting contributing rather than sole attribution.

context_claims.claim_title: Advanced Power Distribution Platform patented in August 2024
context_claims.claim_description: The Advanced Power Distribution Platform received U.S. patent approval in August 2024 after more than four years of development.
context_claims.source_quote: Patented in August 2024, the Advanced Power Distribution Platform is helping to accelerate a smarter approach to grid management and optimization.

context_claims.claim_title: Duke Energy is a utility company serving multiple states
context_claims.claim_description: Duke Energy operates as an electric utility company with coverage areas spanning multiple states including Florida and North Carolina.
context_claims.source_quote: more than 1.5 million electric vehicles expected in Duke Energy's coverage areas by the end of the decade.

context_claims.claim_title: Duke Energy has a 2050 zero carbon goal
context_claims.claim_description: Duke Energy has established a strategic goal to achieve zero carbon emissions by 2050, driving investments in clean energy technologies.
context_claims.source_quote: in support of Duke Energy's 2050 'zero carbon' goal.

context_claims.claim_title: Duke Energy plans to retire remaining coal-fired facilities
context_claims.claim_description: The company is working toward retiring its remaining coal-fired power generation facilities as part of its clean energy transition.
context_claims.source_quote: Expanding renewables is critically important as the company looks to retire its remaining coal-fired facilities

context_claims.claim_title: Expected 1.5 million EVs in Duke Energy coverage areas by end of decade
context_claims.claim_description: Duke Energy anticipates more than 1.5 million electric vehicles will be operating in its service territories by the end of the 2020s decade.
context_claims.source_quote: more than 1.5 million electric vehicles expected in Duke Energy's coverage areas by the end of the decade.

context_claims.claim_description: Duke Energy operates grid management and optimization functions to ensure reliable electricity distribution to customers.
context_claims.source_quote: the Advanced Power Distribution Platform is helping to accelerate a smarter approach to grid management and optimization.

context_claims.claim_title: Clean energy digital strategy and engineering function
context_claims.claim_description: Duke Energy has established a dedicated organizational function for clean energy digital strategy and engineering led by a managing director.
context_claims.source_quote: said John Pressley, managing director of clean energy digital strategy and engineering at Duke Energy.

context_claims.claim_title: Electric utility sector experiencing extraordinary demand increase
context_claims.claim_description: The electric utility sector is preparing for an extraordinary increase in demand for electricity driven by electrification trends.
context_claims.source_quote: while also preparing for an extraordinary increase in demand for electricity.

context_claims.claim_title: Digital transformation organizational unit exists at Duke Energy
context_claims.claim_description: Duke Energy has established a Digital Transformation organization that houses clean energy digital strategy and engineering functions.
context_claims.source_quote: Managing Director of Clean Energy Digital Strategy & Engineering within the Digital Transformation organization at Duke Energy.

context_claims.claim_title: Duke Energy offers managed EV charging programs
context_claims.claim_description: Duke Energy provides managed charging services that can shift EV charging to off-peak hours to reduce grid burden and save customers money.
context_claims.source_quote: Through managed charging, the company has the ability to move that to the daytime or overnight hours, when fewer customers use electricity.

context_claims.claim_title: Utility sector transitioning from one-way to multi-way power flows
context_claims.claim_description: The utility sector is experiencing transformation from traditional one-directional power flow to multi-directional flows due to distributed renewable energy sources like solar and battery storage.
context_claims.source_quote: For more than a century, energy flowed in one direction; wires went up, electricity went out, customers were served. Now, multiple sources of renewable energy direct power back into the grid

context_claims.claim_title: DTECH conference panel scheduled for March 25, 2025
context_claims.claim_description: John Pressley will participate in a panel discussion about AI reshaping utility work at DTECH conference on March 25, 2025 from 1:00-1:50 PM.
context_claims.source_quote: taking place March 25, from 1:00 PM-1:50 PM.
